Text:
Thanks mate. Great upload. EXCELLENT
I have tested it on W7 Ultimate and the suggestion is here:
-install, 
-crack it (overwrite exe file) 
-start the program but DO NOT UPDATE when asked or serial wont work
-enter the serial/registration number
-never run live update 'cause will ask you for serial again and wont accept the provided one.

When I've scanned  without serial it will find a few driver to be updated.
When registered the shit wont find any needed driver because they think they've got the money. Not in our case. Fucken capitalist - FUCK them GLOBALLY.
GOD BLESS P2P & TORRENTS & OPEN SOURCE
I'v tried most of the so called BEST, but always revert back to the free "DRIVER MAX" this gives positive updates not like this program and others that show "OBSOLETE DRIVER UPDATES"
Skiten funkar inte. Har fรถretaget kursat eftersom deras site inte finns, samt att det inte laddar ner nรฅgot. Grr.

First this is not version 9.0.0.180 its 9.0.0.189 second if serials dont work then try this one instead

BVADJM-PS89CP-GGQ6C4-59PNTT-FS6H5W-Q7SYSH

Cheers :)!
